name: UbuntuRu Dark
description:
Dark style with low contrast.</br>
The icons are not changed.</br>
Affects on http://forum.ubuntu.ru, https://debianforum.ru, https://packages.ubuntu.com</br>
Modification of the upper panel is spread only on Ubuntu.ru</br>
This style has been tested in browsers vivaldi-snapshot, opera-developer and nightly (firefox). Correct work in other browsers is not guaranteed.
